meanings.sent1: The yogins in the class showed great flexibility during the yoga session.
meanings.sent2: Many yogins gather in the park every morning to practice yoga together.
meanings.sent3: The yogins decided to have a yoga party to celebrate their progress.
meanings.sent4: She moved gracefully like a yogins in a yoga pose.
meanings.sent5: The yogins' dedication to yoga was truly inspiring.

meanings.sent1: The yogins were discussing their favorite yoga poses.
meanings.sent2: I met a group of yogins at the yoga retreat last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The yogins all wore matching yoga outfits to the class.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the energy of the yogins practicing together.
meanings.sent5: The yogins' unity in their yoga practice was evident to everyone.
